```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(png)
```
# Reading user data CSV
```{r}
data <- read.csv(file = 'data.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```
# Example sorting data by user ID code -> chanfe decreasing to check results
```{r}
dataFinal <- data[order(data[, "CODE"]), , drop = FALSE]
df <- data.frame(id=dataFinal$CODE,messagesone=dataFinal$MESSAGES1.1,messagestwo=dataFinal$MESSAGES2.1, gender=dataFinal$GENDER)
```
# Writing user data in final CSV
# write.csv(dataFinal, file = './tmp/dataAfter.csv')
```{r}
dataNew <- dataFinal$MESSAGES1.1
dataNames <- c(dataFinal$CODE)

x= c(dataNames)
y= c(dataNew)

barplot(y, mainlab= "main", xlab= "MESSAGES1-1", ylab= "NUMBER",
        names.arg= x)
```
```{r}
dataNew <- dataFinal$MESSAGES2.1
dataNames <- c(dataFinal$CODE)

x= c(dataNames)
y= c(dataNew)

barplot(y, mainlab= "main", xlab= "MESSAGES2-1", ylab= "NUMBER",
        names.arg= x)
```
```{r}
dataNew <- dataFinal$RIGHTS1.1
dataNames <- c(dataFinal$CODE)

x= c(dataNames)
y= c(dataNew)

barplot(y, mainlab= "main", xlab= "RIGHTS1.1", ylab= "NUMBER",
        names.arg= x)
```
```{r}
dataNew <- dataFinal$RIGHTS2.1
dataNames <- c(dataFinal$CODE)

x= c(dataNames)
y= c(dataNew)

barplot(y, mainlab= "main", xlab= "RIGHTS1.1", ylab= "NUMBER",
        names.arg= x)
```
## ggplot
# Messages for first sesion
```{r}
ggplot(data=df) +
  geom_bar(aes(x=as.factor(id), y=as.factor(messagesone)),
    stat = 'identity',
    width = 0.3,
    fill='tomato2')  +
  theme_classic()
ggsave("./images/gg1.png")
```
# Number of genders
```{r}
ggplot(data=df) +
  geom_bar(aes(x=gender)) +
  scale_fill_hue(c = 40) +
  theme(legend.position="none")
ggsave("./images/gg2.png")
```
